## TypeOfExtensionClass type

Retrieve the instance type from an ExtensionClass.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TypeOfExtensionClass<GExtensionClass extends AnyConstructor, GExtension extends InstanceType<GExtensionClass> = InstanceType<GExtensionClass>> = GExtension extends AnyExtension ? GExtension : never;
```
